channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For Children, Surrogacy Always Creates A Deep, Gaping Hole Where A Mother Should Be
item.description: Like a sapling wounded early, my life bent and grew around the gaping wound of abandonment. It became a part of me.

item.title: Intel: (Jean-Baptiste) Colbert and Corleone
item.description: The week of September 1, 2025: Intel’s new role, gold, government statistics, the Fed, and much, much more.

item.title: Russia’s Drone Incursion over Poland Demands a Serious Response
item.description: If Russia thinks NATO is a paper tiger, Moscow must be forced to reconsider.

item.title: Israel’s Qatar Strike on Hamas Suggests Arab Cooperation
item.description: Clues point to tacit support from Jordan and Saudi Arabia, despite their public protests.

item.title: Trump’s Bold Strike Against the Venezuelan Narco-Communist Regime
item.description: By bombing drug traffickers and invoking the Alien Enemies Act, Trump honors the just war imperative to protect the U.S. from hemispheric perils.

item.title: Oliver North marries his famous secretary, Fawn Hall, decades after Iran-Contra
item.description: It's been 40 years since the Iran-Contra scandal caused a sensation in Washington and headaches for the Reagan administration. Now, two key figures in...

item.title: Court says Lisa Cook can stay on Federal Reserve Board of Governors while lawsuit plays out
item.description: A federal judge ruled late Tuesday that Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook can remain in her position during the legal fight over President Trump's at...

item.title: Wholesale prices fell a bit in August, signaling a Federal Reserve rate cut is more likely
item.description: Wholesale prices decreased slightly in August, the federal government said Wednesday, a surprise development that should give the Federal Reserve more...

item.title: Senate Rules Need Not Delay Executive Branch Subordinates
item.description: John Thune’s proposed rule change is mostly about ending a pointless charade.

item.title: Michigan Judge Tosses Democrat Lawfare Against 2020 Trump Electors
item.description: In a major win for the rule of law, a Michigan judge dismissed Democrat-backed lawfare waged against the state’s 2020 Republican electors on Tuesday, ...

item.title: Appeals court restores Copyright Office chief, says Trump's firing attempt was illegal
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that President Trump's move to fire the head of the U.S. Copyright Office likely stretched beyond the law, and...

item.title: Evidence Shows Women Are At Least As Likely To Abuse Partners As Men
item.description: 'The last taboo' is the idea that women initiate or engage in domestic violence as much as, or in some cases even more, than men do.

item.title: We Need To Bring Back Mass Incarceration And Involuntary Commitment
item.description: Senseless violence in our cities isn’t an unsolvable problem. Street psychotics like Decarlos Brown Jr. need to be locked away.

item.title: Each Word Of This NYT Agitprop On The Charlotte Murder Is Worse Than The Last
item.description: The entire article is an exercise in lazy propaganda slop, and they don't care if you notice. Just don't go around noticing any more crimes.

item.title: Harris says leaving reelection decision to Biden was 'recklessness,' but she defends his abilities
